channel.title: Gov. Pedro Pierluisi on Contact United States Senators and Governors

item.title: Pedro Pierluisi bio
item.description: Know more about Gov.Pedro Pierluisi Pedro Pierluisi is the Governor of Puerto Rico and presides over the New Progressive Party. He was elected on November 3, 2020. Pierluisi is a lawyer from San Juan with 35 years of experience in the public and private sectors. He began his professional career in Washington, D.C. as an assistant to Resident Commissioner Baltasar Corrada del Rio. He then practiced for six years as a trial lawyer in that city.
